articles.title: “I felt like they were afraid of me.” Monkeypox patients call out lack of support from healthcare professionals, government - Xtra Magazine
articles.description: As cases continue to rise in North America, queer and trans men are still struggling to access monkeypox vaccines, treatment and financial aid
articles.content:
Without emergency treatment, lesions from monkeypox would have cost Brandon sight in one of his eyes.
